metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3132 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Goolytics WordPress plugin before 1.1.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
